p: The plasma of the patient was collected from the patient with HPAI H7N9 infection. Ten normal plasma samples were collected from the healthy volunteers. The cytokines and chemokines in human plasma was measured using the Bio-Plex Pro™ Human Cytokine Screening Panel, 48-Plex (Cat#12007283, Bio-Rad, Hercules, CA, USA). Serum samples from the mice were detected using Bio-Plex Pro™ Mouse Cytokine Grp I Panel 23-Plex (Cat#M60009RDPD, Bio-Rad, Hercules, CA, USA). The detection was based on the Bio-Plex 200 system (Bio-Rad) and performed according to the manufacturer instructions.
